page.title: 20BIRTH OF CRESTWOOD SCHOOL 3
page.content: The curving nave assumes the image of an aviary, Anticipating all manner of frantic activity. Eyes are encouraged upwards as you gape, open-mouthed, Following trees' searching branches, Up to the girded heights an perspex sky-light. This mass of exciting archtectural imagination is somewhat disrupted By the regimental line of cold,grey lockers, Resembling left luggage,safe deposit boxes; Each one crammed full of personal and edible secrets. The bells ring and the pace is set for the educational promenade, As Marucci's ice-cream cornets parade down the paved boulevard. Crestwood's ready the community awaits
